title: 30.) Top 40 Countdown - Why Can't I Leave My Cheatin' Man?
description:
Brooke told herself that she would leave her cheating husband once her kids were grown and out of the house, but now she's scared to make the change. Dr. Laura: "If you let scary stop you, you'll never see the beautiful possibilities."
